website_summaries.verdict: The ideal pick for buyers seeking a knee pillow specializing in alignment and comfort.
pros: Recommended brand by doctors and owners alike
Designed to promote hip and spine alignment
Customers raved over its ability to relieve joint pain
cons: Harder pillow than most customers expected
Small in size when compared to similar models

customer_reviews.title: My knees have found their new pillow
customer_reviews.text: Recently, my chiropractor told me I should sleep with a pillow between my legs to help with my hip and back pain. Using a normal pillow was okay, but I'd fight with the pillow all night and wake up with sweaty legs. I've been using this knee pillow for the last 2 weeks, and it's a WORLD of difference. It's like it was created to fit perfectly between my knees, but I'm sure it'll fit perfectly in between your knees just as well. No more fights with my pillow, and no more waking up with sweaty legs!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazed... It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical that this would actually work on my sciatic nerve pain. However, I was so wrong! I am an overweight 40 year old chef in a D1 College Restaurant. We serve upwards of 3-4 thousand a day. So I am on my feet 8 hours straight. 20,000 steps a day minimum. So needless to say... By the time I get home I was in pain. But ever since I bought this.. NONE! I AM FLIPPING AMAZED! BEST INVESTMENT EVER!! TOTALLY RECOMMEND! I have has sciatica for 10 years. This is the only thing that has fully relieved it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as a neck pillow, too.
customer_reviews.text: I gave a four star rating for this reason. This pillow is sized for smaller thighs than mine. The pillow is a big shot for me. I am still using it, but I would like it better if there was more distance between the two ends. The materials of the pillow are firm and do not crush under the weight of the upper thigh. The covering is nice and soft. I have started using this pillow for under my neck while reading in bed. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gingkogirl

customer_reviews.title: Now this a a great knee pillow !
customer_reviews.text: I've used a pillow like this between my legs for years but noticed the one I have seems " squishy or soft " I decided to try this brand and what a pleasant surprise ! It's firm and comfortable and holds my legs apart MUCH better than the old soft foam pillow I just discarded
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: " This product is easy to use and stays in place comfortably
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it appeared smaller than shown on website but I decided to give it a try. On day 1 I noticed a difference and was impressed with the product. I am now on day 4 and the discomfort and pain I've had for about a month is gone! I woke up this morning and said, "hey this works!" This product is easy to use and stays in place comfortably. I highly recommend the cushy form pillow. It gave me quick results.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this knee pillow! I fall asleep so much faster now that I'm not tossing and turning trying to get my legs comfortable. Unfortunately, the cat also thinks it was made for him and we fight for it at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Diviney

customer_reviews.title: Used dirty pillow
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift and it came covered in hair (human and dog hair). I’m highly dissatisfied with the quality of this purchase. This is unsanitary! Thank goodness I looked at it first before I gifted it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Picture is misleading/false advertising. This thing is tiny and offers little to no support. Sent it back. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Not truley an adult size cushion.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is way smaller than I expected. I must have read review & description wrong which is my fault clearly. Unless you are a very small person or child I doubt this will provide any sciatic Nerve Pain Relief.
customer_reviews.author: Msmojo

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow has helped immensely, keeping my legs from moving about while I sleep. The fact that the pillow stays in place while sleeping has been a major factor in eliminating the burning and cramping in my legs. I have also used the pillow to help me achieve a better position while doing exercises my physical therapist has given me. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Y R DeLoach

customer_reviews.title: Made Nice, But Too Thick For My Lower Back Pain, Cause More Pain
customer_reviews.text: Too thick, I needed something half the thickness, put too much tork in my hip and back and cause pain in the first minute, I tried it 3 times to give a a fair evaluation, but just not for me.. For someone else it may be just right, I am a women 130 lbs, so a larger women or man it may be just perfect. Or if you do not have lower back pain in the last few vertebrae.
customer_reviews.author: Nirupa

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back and hips! Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was semi-skeptical at first but I have become a believer. I use it when side sleeping and it has greatly reduced my hip and knee pain. I can tell a huge difference even if I'm just laying on my side for a few minutes without it. Depending on where the pillow is at on my knees, I will get just a regular pillow and place it between my feet, but that's not necessary or an every time thing. Because my knees are aligned, my hip pain is decreased and there's no strain on my lower back thus making me feel better and getting better sleep. Wish I had this YEARS AGO!
customer_reviews.author: H and H HONEY

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: For over 30 years I have used a pillow between my legs to help ease back and hip pain, but this new pillow is more stable and solid than a regular pillow. Lately I had been getting hip pain when I got out of bed, but with the Cushy Form, that ended. Only 1 problem, it doesn't stay in place once in a while and I have to hunt for it. No biggie compared to the relief it gives me.
customer_reviews.author: karmajane

customer_reviews.title: Not made for larger people.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not made for plus size people. After using for 30 minutes, it's entirely flat. This is made for people who have thinner legs and thighs. It's comfortable at first, but then I'm having to remove it and let it fluff back up. The material is made well, just not big enough for us larger folks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the knees
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift to a good friend of mine and the feedback was very positive. I would recommend using this if you have knee problems. It helps take the pressure off while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Grape

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended that I get one of these pillows to help my body stay aligned while I sleep so that my back pain might be reduced. It arrived quickly and in perfect condition. I haven't noticed any life changing differences in my sleep quality or my pain levels but I do find it much more comfortable to fall asleep when I am using this pillow. It is also reassuring to know that I am doing something while I am sleeping which is proactive/preventative and could have long term benefits in terms of my posture and general body structure.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Terrible in that it does nothing to alleviate back pressure or pain in lower back or if you have, which I do sciatica. Sturdy construction but if I could return I would and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Missing Item - Item Not As Described
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to get this pillow because I suffer from severe back pain and sciatica. The images on the website make the pillow appear bigger/wider than the actual size. The pillow is very small and does not remain in place. I also did not receive the bag as listed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: CharlyRose

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: It is so tiny and not even close to firm enough. It just squishes to next to nothing when I use it and is more annoying than what it is worth since it's so tiny. I am a side sleeper and always have used a normal pillow between my legs but I still wake up with back pain from it so thought I would try this. It is completely useless and I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hammen

customer_reviews.title: It feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a side sleeper, and this pillow is exactly what I needed to add some extra comfort and keep my hips and spine properly aligned as I sleep. I haven't noticed any major changes to my sleep quality, but that's probably more because of my mattress than the pillow. My mattress is getting up there in years and is due for a replacement. Something I will say, however, is the added comfort of this pillow has helped me in FALLING asleep. Overall, I'm really glad I bought this and would highly recommend it if you're a side sleeper like me in need of some added support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M

customer_reviews.title: Mini pregnancy sleep support pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have a large pregnancy pillow from my last kiddo that I just couldn't get comfortable with this time around. I was having awful sciatic pain so bought this to try to get some relief. It cleared up my back issues immediately after using this at night! As time has progressed I still get pain here and there but this has made sleeping so much more comfortable. I was even able to squish it down and pack it for a recent vacation as I didn't want to be with out it for 6 nights! Zip off cover was fairly easy to remove and wash as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, disaster
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, disaster, caused horrible pain. The pillow is top thick, too dense.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this pillow. I was looking to replace a memory foam knee pillow I was using that went flat shortly after I purchased it. I read the reviews and decided to give it try. I LOVE IT!!! It is firm but soft. I have bursitis in the hip and as soon as I placed the pillow between my knees, I felt relief in my hip. I'm a side sleeper so the firmness helps keep my leg straight thus alleviating the constant hip pain. I'm so glad I made the purchase, and so is my hip!!
customer_reviews.author: pattiecakes

customer_reviews.title: Great Help for Hip Pain
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was perfect for me since I'm a side sleeper and I toss and turn all night. It was very easy to change my position since the pillow is compact and stays put between my thighs, unlike using a regular bed pillow where I have to readjust it each time I turn to the opposite side. Having my hips in alignment by using this pillow eliminates the soreness and allows me to sleep. The pillow does get warm, though, since it's made of memory foam, but I'd rather tolerate that than pain, which keeps me up at night.
customer_reviews.author: SunKira

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I have spine and hip issues that require that I sleep with a pillow between my legs when sleeping on my side. For years, I used a regular pillow, which was okay but often a hassle to sleep with. Recently, my physical therapist advised I should look into a knee pillow for better sleep. I looked around and found this one. Surprisingly, it works really well. Stays in place when sleeping on my side, usually stays in place when I roll over (unlike the regular pillow, which usually ended up on the floor in the middle of the night). I'm happy with this pillow, it has contributed to better nights sleep. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This item for me was way to hard on my joints. I used it one night and it was not a pleasant experience at all. I'm a side sleeper and have used a pillow between my knees forever. They offer much more relief to me than this memory foam unit. I went ahead and purchased some expensive pillows on Amazon and they do the trick for me but I'm real sensitive to rigid and hard objects. Might work for someone else but not for me. It was easy to return and no hassle from Amazon. Best customer service after sale anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Almost returned, but does relieve pain so kept!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to help with pain. It definitely helps with the pain! Its odd feeling and not the most comfortable to sleeping. I’ve replaced this with a body pillow, but cannot sleeping with it without putting another pillow between the base of my knees and ankles, which makes it much more comfortable. I was gonna return the item, but because it does help I decided to give it another night. Glad I did, because it’s better than not having it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ok, soft pillow but gives me upper back sourness throughout the morning, lower back is gone (which is far worse than upper back problems)! I’ll be honest my muscles could be trying to get use to the change after 40 yrs or I am not laying correctly when I sleep. If it helps: I was someone that tools 45-70 minutes to get warmed up in the morning, it takes me 10-15 now. Would buy again. M-
customer_reviews.author: Martin L. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Instant lower back relief
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper, but I have recently been battling hip and lower back pain. This knee pillow has made a huge difference in my quality of sleep and pain relief. It has a soft cover and is very firm, so it doesn’t squish down instantly with weight/pressure. It took a few tries to figure out the placement that worked best for me, but that would be as expected. While I knew it would help, I was surprised about the essentially instant relief.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda CW

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The knee pillow arrived fast and was packed very well. It comes in a plastic zippered pouch for easy storage, and a lavender sachet is a pleasant touch. What is impressive, though, is the pillow itself. It is firm, but soft enough to give when necessary. My doctor recommended a pillow like this for sleeping on my side to relieve back pain, and I could not have found a better pillow to use. It has a case on it for easy washing. I am impressed with the quality of the product and with the care with which the package was prepared to mail.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love sleeping on my side but...
customer_reviews.text: I love sleeping in my side but there was this nagging uncomfortable feeling of my thighs pressing together. well now that it's gone because of the use of this knee pillow I find my sleep is of better quality and much better comfort. The first picture show the pillow with its cover and separately that fully opens one side for a easy removal and laundering. the second picture shows the underlying foam pillow without the cover. I have used it 2 separate ways-between both knees and just under one knee. Can't say like one over the other because they both work so well in different situations.
customer_reviews.author: OMaggie*

customer_reviews.title: Great Mother's Day gift!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Usually my wife sleeps with a pillow but she's been complaining about her hips and her sciatic nerve acting up. Her chiropractor said that her hips are twisting and her si joints are out of wack almost every time she goes into the office. This pillow arrived yesterday for Mother's day. It was delivered early in the morning. My wife never takes a nap but she put put it between her knees and laid down for just a few minutes to try it out and was asleep until almost 2:30pm. When she woke up her pain was gone. I'd say that's a win for everyone and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: J Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been complaining that I like to rest my knee or leg on her. I like to stretch and I was tired of using a pillow once I saw this on sale I bought one and I must say its very comfortable to use. I like it and I recommend it. My biggest problem, but its not because of the knee pillow is I toss and turn a lot and I find this knee pillow on the other side of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for my body. Otherwise a great little pillow.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is a very soft cottony feeling cover, however, the knee pillow just didn't work for me, unfortunately. It was just a bit too high. I have short legs and am only about 5 ft tall and this made my hips just a little too far apart from one another. If that had not been the case, I would have kept it. The pillow is firm, but not overly so and seems to hold up to a decent amount of pressure. It just didn't work for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Bamgela

customer_reviews.title: Helping back and knee pain!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who suffers with lower back pain, I ordered this to give a try. I constantly flip flop in the bed and would loose it during the night. My hubby decided to give it a try and the next morning woke up singing its praises! He said he could tell a big difference with his back and knee pain the next morning! He has been using for several nights now and still telling a difference! So wuth ghat, I would highly recommend if you don't constantly flop like a fish all night!
customer_reviews.author: littlefriend

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep aid for lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but since I used a regular pillow for the same purpose previously, I figured, "why not try?" Pillow arrived in a couple of days. The form-fitting is nice -- just the right width to keep my posture aligned. I've been sleeping with it a week now and my lower back, legs feel much less stressed when I wake up in the AM. And, bonus -- my 7yo says it's great to put your head on when you're reading a book.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pond

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife as she has been dealing with sciatica pain, but it is too early to tell if it has made a difference. Only issue is that my wife likes to move a lot in her sleep. So, sometimes i have to prompt her to place it back. I will update to see if it has made improvement for my wife's back/ sciatica. It is very durable, soft, great bounce, and i love that the cover can be removed for washing. it does come with a carry/travel case. Looks promising
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s so lightweight and compact. I’m bowlegged and thin, so I wish it was a little thicker, but I’ve just been moving it down closer to my knees. Once it’s in place it stays perfect all night. I haven’t tried to take the cover off to wash it. So the verdict is till out on that. I may even order an extra because it’s compact enough I can travel with it. I’m so volunteering to give this review.
customer_reviews.author: sewanee 2010

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how much difference this makes in my lower back pain! Have been going to the chiropractor for two months...she suggested I get a knee pillow. After reading the many reviews I settled on the Comfort Form and I’m so glad I did...after two nights of getting used to it, I woke with no pain and have been using it every night and have been pain free since! I recommend this to anyone with sciatic nerve pain!
customer_reviews.author: Karenhi

customer_reviews.title: It Actually Worked for Me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my son and decided to try on as well. I felt a sharp pain ocassionally in my right hip. I've been using this pillow for about a week and I havn't had the pain. Previously I was using a small throw pillow between my knees that provided cushioning between my knees but did nothing for changing my hip aliignment. I was skeptical; I'm vey pleasantly delighted. I hope it works for my son as well as it did for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: A crucial step in guarding against pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 knee replacements and have another scheduled for this fall! A cushion for my most painful knee is a blessing. This cushion really works! I’m a back sleeper but do occasionally lie on my side; it is absolutely imperative that my cushion is between my knees! It’s the only way. The cushion is well built and well packaged. You can tell the company takes pride in their product!
customer_reviews.author: AlversonMontgomery

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable support when lying on your side, one can immediately feel the improvement.
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought the pillow was too short, probably because I was using a sofa pillow before I got the Knee pillow. After a few days, the knee pillow felt perfect and still does. It definitely does what it was designed to do. Whether it relieves pain depends I think on what was/is causing the pain. For sure, the back is better aligned when using the knee pillow so I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but needs to be a little bigger for plus size people
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is not really sized for plus size thighs. I am still using it, but I would like it better if there was more distance between the two ends. The materials of the pillow are firm but comfortable. I'd like it if my thighs fit. If you are a bigger person, maybe it will still work for you but it does work well as a neck pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: Better sleep, best product.
customer_reviews.text: I use this darn thing every night. I can’t sleep without it. It’s like a bad habit that you don’t want to kick, but it’s good for you. I’m a big boy 250lbs at 6’ tall. It takes pain away from my hips at night and helps my lower back (which has issues) through the night. Best little knee pillow. Easy to clinch and roll from side to side too!
customer_reviews.author: Prfine

customer_reviews.title: Makes Sleeping on Your Side So Much More Comforable
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if my knees are just boney and that is what makes it uncomfortable or if it's my bed BUT this pillow makes a world of difference. I just had a TOTAL KNEE REPLACEMENT and they tell you not to put anything under your need for sleeping and you can sleep on your side because having your knees touch HURTS. With the KNEE PILLOW you can put it between your knees and it is very comfortable. Now, I sleep like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: It’s comfortable and it really worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on my side which means one leg is resting atop the other. At some point I move one leg forward which leaves my knee taking pressure sideways and, kind of, hanging. It wakes me up but no matter what position I move the pain remains until I get up and moving. The Cushy Form pillow has quickly and easily stopped all of that.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Makes a big difference with pain and sleep once you get used to it
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of problems with my lower back and hips as they are full of rods and screws. If my hips are not aligned perfectly I have a lot of pain. This pillow helps keep my hips aligned properly and relieves the pain. It took a couple weeks to really get used to it and be able to sleep with it. But once I was used to it it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Too flat after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this little pillow in the first month or so, but now 3 months later, it is useless. It looks the same, but when placing it between my legs now, there is no support left. I have had to go back to using the full-sized pillow I was using before--a very cheap bed pillow--to get my upper leg to raise up a bit and give relief to my hip pain. Wish I could send it back. I would advise that you avoid "cushy" pillows: something more firm and less soft might have held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Bhamster

customer_reviews.title: Soft yet supportive
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. It's so soft to the touch, but yet holds my leg firmly. I need to buy another one, though, because, as a side sleeper, elevating my knee puts to much twist on it, so I need one for my ankles, too. Definitely happy with this pillow, and it's surprisingly inexpensive for the high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M Varney

customer_reviews.title: Good leg pillow
customer_reviews.text: Much better than using a regular pillow for side sleeping. The shape of the pillow helps it stay in place even if you move a bit in your sleep. A bit firm than what I was hoping for but I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Safe and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After having a new hip installed, with many hip precautions, this pillow is comfy, very small, and does not wiggle nor move around or slip. You can sleep in peace and keep your hips and knees in the right distance needed. A very easy and useful pillow to have and with the cute carry case you can take it with you too.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie A. Keating

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow if you stay put when you sleep
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this five stars because it does exactly what it's supposed to with no issues. It is soft and feels comfortable between the knees. But for some reason I just can't sleep with this. I toss and turn a lot when I sleep so I have no idea how people keep this pillow between their knees for the duration of their night sleep. Every time I wake up in the morning or even in the middle of the night his pillow is knocked off the bed to the floor. So I don't really see a point in it now.
customer_reviews.author: Beriah Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Better off using a pillow and finding your own comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: Better off using a pillow and finding your own comfortable position. This locks you into a certain position which may not be comfortable for everyone, not to mention bigger legs... I gave mine away, and they sold it at a garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: OC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I expected but that turned out to be OK. I read recently that you don't want your legs to touch, that is what causes discomfort and this pillow helps to do that. I use it just to rest my knee on sometimes, because that is my main issue. My legs do not seem to be as uncomfortable as before. so yes, this pillow was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Chiapa

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I use this pillow! I bought one a couple years ago and swore by it. He tried it early one morning after I had gotten up early and wouldn’t give it back! Makes a huge difference in sleep quality and daily activities. He swears he has no more hip pain and works on his feet all day long! I can say the same and my sciatic doesn’t bother me as often as it did. Don’t hesitate, just get one. I’ve also washed the cover numerous times and it’s still in excellent shape!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Eurich

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for side sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a life saver. I am a side sleeper but have issues with my hip, so it can be quite painful on my side. But this has helped so much to take the strain off my hip. I find once I fall asleep I wake up and it’s still right where I put it, I am sleeping much more soundly. I also sleep very hot so I was concerned this may make me too hot - but I actually find that using this allows my legs not to touch and I sleep cooler as well. Great purchase if you are a side sleeper!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: yet soft enough to be comfortable. Due to the compact size of this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’m very thin and sleep on my side. My knees would ‘grind’ into each other, causing pain. Therefore, I use this pillow to create space between my knees. The foam is dense enough to keep my knees from touching, yet soft enough to be comfortable. Due to the compact size of this pillow, it is also much easier to roll from side-to-side while sleeping. This knee pillow is a bit smaller than another one I tried, so may not provide enough support for a larger person (I only weigh about 120 lbs), but for me, it’s perfect. I’m very happy with this pillow and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SI

customer_reviews.title: great grab for the money - fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: ordered this just 12 hours ago and it came just when i needed it to. i have been laid out and achy due to being sick and this helped with my alignment right away. will use for travel too. if you need something to keep your feet apart too though you’ll still need a pillow. very happy so far. and it came with the cutest little lavender air freshener too.
customer_reviews.author: Christenson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but Small
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how small this pillow was before I purchased this item. It does it job and helps my back when sleeping, I'm a side sleeper. The main problem comes with how small this thing actually is. When I turn from side to side during the night it does not stay positioned and maybe I'm asking too much for it to stay in place. But when I turn I slightly wake up to reposition and it ends up I don't get a great nights sleep. Probably going to give it away to a smaller person since another thing to note is I am 6'4"
customer_reviews.author: Jason W

customer_reviews.title: Designed for Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. Helps relieve lower back pain. Love the shape of this pillow. One end is thicker, so you can flip it over to adjust how far or narrow you want your knees apart. Feels perfectly natural. I thought for sure it would be uncomfortable or awkward. It's not!
customer_reviews.author: Y.Annette

customer_reviews.title: You have to try this....it’s wonderful ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knee pillow, being a little skeptical. I am a side sleeper and use a regular pillow between my knees, so I thought this would better, since it is substantially smaller than a regular pillow. Can I just tell you...This little pillow is awesome. Takes the pressure off my back. I even tried the other recommended use, on the lower back. Oh my! It’s so wonderful. Try it... see what you think. I am totally enjoying my pillow.
customer_reviews.author: GOINGSOME

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, sturdy, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve already put a review out there on this pillow, but now that I’ve had my hip surgery and am using it for post-op, I cannot recommend this product enough. It helps with the pain, keeping my hips aligned and making sure there is not too much weight placed on my surgical hip. Definitely one of the best products I’ve purchased through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Product was what they said it was. Very comfortable and easy to keep in between knees while sleeping. Have not cleaned it yet but cover looks easy to do so. The foam was firm and took the pressure of my joints.
customer_reviews.author: Al Monterio

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always slept on my side and used a small pillow to prevent contact between my knees. Recently I began waking up in the night with hip and back pain, unable to get comfortable, and was sore in the mornings. I saw this foam pillow and decided to try it. The first night, I slept without waking and had no pain the next morning. I guess it helped align my sleep posture to prevent pressure of my joints. This is one of the best purchases I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.author: C. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product. I purchased a cheaper brand to see how these pillows worked. It worked but was stiff. This one is comfortable and easy to unzip to wash cover. I had a sciatic nerve problem and I'm a side sleeper. This pillow is great.
customer_reviews.author: Library fairy

customer_reviews.title: Every. Single. Night. A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. I've had it since January and I use it every. Single. Night. This has granted me the ablility to have a great night of sleep and no more back pain. I have pseudotumor cerebri and this has made the nerve pain at night minimal if not completely diminished. (Especially since for me it's coming from my lower back and neck) 10/10 recommend! Not to mention it's super easy to wash! It's still in perfect shape and condintion after countless washes now!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Webb

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has done wonders for my morning back pain. I knew keeping your spine aligned would help but everything I had ever tried was such a hassle. This pillow moves with me with very little adjustment. Just the thing I needed. Thanks for a wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Faye Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is comfortable and does provide pain relief. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I wish it was bigger. It tends to slide out from my knees when I turn over during my sleep. I wake to find it in the middle of the bed instead of between my knees. That is the only negative thing I have to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sdpritchett

customer_reviews.title: Started realizing relief after the very first night!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second knee pillow that I have purchased. I bought the first one a couple weeks ago and found that it significantly reduced my hip and lower back pain that was causing me to wake up frequently throughout the night. My wife tried it and loved it as well so I purchased this second one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pillow for comfortable sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased one quite a while back and used it regularly. While my husband was having back problems, he tried the pillow and really liked it. We both needed a good night's sleep, so I ordered him one also. Recommend this pillow for hip and back issues.
customer_reviews.author: R Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this knee pillow. I will give it some more time and make updates as required but as for now it is worthy of the full 5 stars. Definitely on the firm end which I like and it is small in size so does not get in the way. Only knock I can give is that sometimes my legs fall out if alingment since the pillow is small and not designed to keep one leg on top if the other when you shift around at night. But that is not a knok on the design . for the most part it stays in position. I like it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think this pillow is high quality. It's value for a variety of sleep issues related to leg position is apparent from use. I've not adapted to it fully yet. The positioning is something I still play with. A bit small for me perhaps? Maybe it just takes a bit of adjusting to, like new shoe inserts/orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Wǒ tài xìnggǎnle

customer_reviews.title: First time purchase- Extremely Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Knee Pillow for Side Sleepers - Sciatic Nerve Pain Relief Leg Pillow!!!!! If you have SI joint pain and/or sciatic nerve pain, you must have one of these. I was skeptical, but now i have (2) one to travel with in hotels and one for home. It is great!!
customer_reviews.author: S. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Nothing spectatliar, Was using a throw pillow before, this works better, smaller and compact and it does the job. I am 5'-11" 200# with fairly large thighs, it still works great. Just buy it and put it to use. Not sure on how well it cleans, only have for two weeks now. Again, just buy it and put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic remedy.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was in so much pain before as I have a bad back and hip and even my new mattress was making things worse. Now that I have this, I can’t be without it. I don’t wake up in the middle of the night with hip pain. Now it’s not a cure but a fantadtic remedy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Infante

customer_reviews.title: Helps correct sleeping posture
customer_reviews.text: This pillow helps everything stay aligned while sleeping. I found it additionally helpful to put part of my blanket between my ankles for additional alignment. The knee pillow is made of memory foam and has a handy cover that comes with it which you can wash.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Gibble

customer_reviews.title: The difference in comfort is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable than without it. I tried it as something to hold up my arm. Works great. I won't sleep without it. It also, with a foam neck pillow, keeps me from tossing and turning. Unbelievable the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline T. Moulder

customer_reviews.title: The company cares about their customers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually my daughter wanted to try it because she’s been having trouble with her shoulder. It seems to be helping her. Sorry I actually can’t help more. I’m waiting for the delivery of my bed and I’ll order another of your aides. I do have confidence that your company makes good products and cares about their customers. That goes miles for me to do support a business like that 👏👏👏
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clear

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for hip and sciatica pain!
customer_reviews.text: This Cushy Form knee pillow is great! I've been having some bad hip pains and sciatica - slept with this knee pillow and it seemed to take care of that! Very pleased with it's performance. I would recommend it to anyone with similar problems!
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pillow for Pregnancy I've Used!
customer_reviews.text: I know that most maternity stores have massive pillows, but I have always hated those. I get too hot when I sleep and can't put a massive pillow in a queen sized bed with my husband sleeping next to me! I've been sleeping with a throw pillow between my legs but found this and saw the good reviews, so I decided to try it out. I have been SO. MUCH. MORE. COMFORTABLE. since I started using this pillow! I am currently 24 weeks pregnant and see myself using this throughout the rest of my pregnancy (and after!). Seriously. BUY THIS PILLOW.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Quint

customer_reviews.title: I was a skeptic too...
customer_reviews.text: I have joint pain most days. Sleep is normally a lot of tossing and turning. My bed is full of pillows as well. I decided to buy this because I found that sleeping with a pillow between my legs helped some. After reading the reviews I ordered it. I use the kneel pillow that night and I had NO BACK PAIN IN THE MORNING. Who knows why it works. It just does and I thank God it does.
customer_reviews.author: Product Tester

customer_reviews.title: It helps!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knee pillow. The only issue I have is ( my personal opinion) it should have a little more support. It also has a cover which is a plus, since one can wash it. It came also in a plastic cover, good for storage. Yes I would recommend to friends. All in all I like and it helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Frenchcan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't support a large enough area
customer_reviews.text: This does what it says and is comfortable enough. My main issue is that it elevates the above the knee area only and I have found that puts a little more strain on the knee as the feet "weigh" themselves down. In my opinion a good king size pillow works better as your alignment is much better than just elevating and supporting the above the knee area.
customer_reviews.author: S Wigdor

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS. The best!
customer_reviews.text: Having tried many of these, this is far and away the VERY BEST of all knee pillows. It keeps it's firmness and shape months after using it -and I would guess, probably years. It's super comfortable and just the right height. It's my favorite gadget- and I should know, I'm a gadget freak! Buy one, if you're in the market for a knee pillow, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Oz Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: It took a few tries for me to find the best position and get used to using the cushion. But now I love it! I was surprised that it doesn’t compress or squash down, even after hours of use. Yet it’s pliant enough to mold to your shape while providing support.
customer_reviews.author: BookWoman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING had it for almost 4 years now
customer_reviews.text: I literally purchased this like almost 3 or 4 years ago. I STILL USE IT TO THIS DAY. I literally can not sleep with my keens touching, don't know why, so I purchased this and I literally can not sleep without it. I love it and has lasted me soooooo long. I obviously wash the cover so it still looks new. I believe it did lose a bit of its spongey-ness but still puts in work. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting use to but it does help with my back pain.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it needs to do. My back hasn't felt this good in years! The first couple of weeks using it I was sore but I knew that was just my body adjusting. The only thing I would change is putting an adjustable strap on it. As someone who rolls around a lot in my sleep but usually ends up on my side, I think a strap would help keep it at my knee so I can still have the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: really good. I do not have any sciatic nerve pain ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really, really good. I do not have any sciatic nerve pain in my knees. But, as a preventive measure, this is great. I have been sleeping with this for over a month now and will not go to bed without it. Only flaw in this pillow is the pillow cover's zipper, which I wish was designed to hide inside the zipper ribbon. Yes, this feature is annoying, but the pillow itself is great. I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyJoy

customer_reviews.title: What A Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I do not currently have sciatic nerve pain when sleeping, but got this pillow to relieve knee pain that results from sleeping on my side. This pillow works perfectly for that purpose; much better than the small pad I was using before. If you do have sciatic nerve pain, this pillow should help that too, since it keeps your spine aligned while lying on your side. Highly recommended for a comfortable night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: RKMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few weeks now. I have to say that I like it. It's much better than cramming a pillow between my knees when I go to sleep. It is just the right combination of firm and soft. Definitely can recommend this if you are a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Fino J. Caraco

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and comes with plastic carrying case - perfect for overnight and travel
customer_reviews.text: I usually sleep with body pillow, which is not always convenient to take with you away from home. Bought this so I could take with me when we travel overnight to visit family and friends. Helps with my sciatica.
customer_reviews.author: mmsunmoon

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is nice and soft, it has the right shape but it’s too small for a larger person. It doesn’t separate my legs enough to relieve pain like a regular size memory foam pillow does. It’s almost as if there should be different sizes for different people just like clothing. This would be the small pillow for petite and tiny people and I need like an XXL. I give it 5 stars because I think it would work great if I was a smaller person and they have amazingly GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.author: Arieltap

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the product for my father, he will have a hip replacement in December and this past months have been full of pain for him, he was sleeping super bad so the doctor recommended to put a pillow in the middle of the legs. A regular pillow was to big so we decided to look for something that really was what he needed and found this amazing product in amazon. When we received the pillow I have to say I was surprised the package was so nice, adding to this the quality is amazing and my father is super happy with the product, it really improved his sleep :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support. I am using it to help with keeping the alignment of my back in position. The pillow is a big improvement over using a regular bed pillow and has stayed in place while sleeping. I am very pleased with both the the quality of the pillow and the seller's fast shipping. ~ The Boss
customer_reviews.author: J. Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Lower Back Pain
customer_reviews.text: Was experiencing lower back pain for weeks. Part of the reason was due to lack of shoes with good support. I have changed up my bad shoe habits and after several google searches I found these type of knee cushions helps allow good posture while sleeping. After a few days of using my lower back pain improved. It’s been several weeks now and I would recommend this to anyone needing help with lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez Review

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I liked mine, and found that it helps as long as I don’t move around while sleeping ( of course, it doesn’t move with you) since it , must be adjusted if you change sleeping positions.. We actually wound u hi p buying a 2nd one, so we each have one.
customer_reviews.author: JcJC

customer_reviews.title: awesome knee pillow
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillow! My husband got a similar knee pillow but it lost width and didn't have cover for washing. I intentionally searched for the thickest dimension thinking it would break down. When it arrived, I seemed too thick but decided to try it for a while. I got it a couple of months ago and have been pleasantly surprised. I hold it just above my knee. I find it really easy to switch sides I sleep on during the night. It has alleviated my knee and hip pain. It has not lost its shape nor width. I strongly recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie overberg

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw - Zipper Scrapes
customer_reviews.text: Quality of pillow is ok with stitching starting to come apart after a few uses but the major issue is the design in that top of zipper sticks out and scrapes your leg while sleeping! I gave input directly to company and got a cordial corporate response that they would pass on the input......So if you don't mind your leg getting scraped up during sleep, then this is a pillow for you!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: This is what I needed all along
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this knee pillow for me in hopes that it would alleviate my sciatic nerve pain. I was willing to give it a try. After one night, I felt a difference in my pain level. After a week of sleeping with this pillow, I am on the mend. Thank you for a great, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: strangswife

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for side sleepers/women who are pregnant.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, 3 months pregnant. She loves it. Before this Knee Pillow, she was using a regular pillow, but the pillow would compress during the night and her hips would hurt, even folding the pillow didn't help. (Plus the regular pillow would "escape" in the middle of the night and end up on the floor or on me. This stays put, relies her hip pain from side sleeping, and has a washable cover!
customer_reviews.author: TZ

product_meta.title: Cushy Form Knee Pillow for Side Sleepers - Sciatic Nerve Pain Relief Leg Pillow - Best for Sciatica, Pregnancy, Hip, Back and Spine Alignment - Memory Foam Orthopedic Contour Wedge with Washable Cover
feature_bullets: CONTOUR KNEE PILLOW - This contoured superior memory foam knee pillow with washable cover allows for a comfortable all night's sleep by elevating your upper knee while placed between your knees. The therapeutic side sleeper body positioner - encourages the correct posture. No more restless nights!

SCIATICA PAIN RELIEF - Eases back, leg, knee, ankle and hip joint pain by providing proper spinal alignment and reducing pressure while sleeping. Just insert the bolster inbetween your knees and sleep on the side most comfortable for you. Customers report great comfort when using our premium knee pillow for sleeping on their side

ESSENTIAL CUSHION - Improves circulation for side sleepers, use as knee spacer during pregnancy or post surgery recovery, assists with restless leg syndrome. Includes a free storage and travel bag! The Cushy Form knee pillow will feel softer in warm and firmer in cold temperatures. The pillow will also react to your body heat by yielding and softening throughout the night

TRUSTED - Recommended by Physical Therapists, Doctors, Sports Trainers and Chiropractors. Can be used as an abductor pilow, and provides relief for hip bursitis and scoliosis. Cushy Form is 100% Visco-elastic memory foam

GUARANTEE - We have a 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, NO QUESTIONS ASKED, NO CATCHES! If you're not thrilled with your purchase for any reason, just tell us and we'll refund 100% of your purchase price - anytime! IDEAL GIFT for Mother's Day, Father's Day, Labor Day Sale, Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Prime Deal Day, Easter or Christmas
